title: Problem building the latest version of Go on march 10 , 2010 under Linux
body:
by **serge.hulne**: 
Problem buiding the latest version on march 10 , 2010 under Linux
(Ubuntu, 8.04 , LTS, server version).

The command used was:

cd go
pull
update release
./All.bash


Serge Hulne

Here is the detailed error listing:


--- cd ../test

Hi,
I encountererd a roblem building the latest version on march 10 , 2010 un
der Linux Ubuntu 8.04 LTS,  (the Ubuntu version which is generally
installed on servers)


< =========== fixedbugs/bug261.go
< throw: slice out of range
< 
< panic PC=xxx
< 
341c174
< $RUNFILE: line 1: PID Segmentation fault      $G $D/$F.go
---
> FAIL
1 known bugs; 15 unexpected bugs; test output differs
FAILED
serge2@shuttle:~/go/src$ 



Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)


Please provide any additional information below.
